sentence: Rob Portman, Rep. Thomas Massie, the Republican from Garrison who represents Northern Kentucky, and Rep. Warren Davidson, a Republican who represents Butler County just north of Cincinnati, responded with a statement.
author: Scott Wartman
title: Portman sides with McConnell against censure of Cheney, Kinzinger. Where local delegation stands on censure, Jan. 6 fights

sentence: Seven Republicans — Reps. Tom Massie of Kentucky, Scott Perry of Pennsylvania, Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, Warren Davidson of Ohio, Liz Cheney of Wyoming, and Andy Biggs and Paul Gosar of Arizona — voted against the bill.
author: Taiyler Simone Mitchell
title: 6 GOP House members opposed a bill meant to document and preserve evidence of war crimes during Russia's invasion of Ukraine

sentence: Andy Biggs, Warren Davidson, Paul Gosar, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Thomas Massie, and Scott Perry all voted 'no' on the bill which passed through the House on Wednesday.
title: 7 Republicans voted against Russian war crimes probe - but one says she did it by mistake

sentence: He called NATO “a relic of the Cold War” and asked, “Why should Americans pay for Europe’s defense?” Blake says GOP Rep. Warren Davidson, who was also one of the six who voted against preserving evidence of war crimes, was a bit more "nuanced."
author: Evan Hurst
title: How Are GOP Congressmen Appeasing Putin The Genociding Murderer Today?

author: Jason Lemon
title: Trump Official Dubs Six GOP Reps. 'Vlad's Cover-Up Crew' for War Crime Vote
